verses.name: 1 Kings 13:13
verses.text: And he said unto his sons, Saddle me the ass. So they saddled him the ass: and he rode thereon,

verses.name: 1 Kings 13:14
verses.text: And went after the man of God, and found him sitting under an oak: and he said unto him, Art thou the man of God that camest from Judah? And he said, I am.

verses.name: 1 Kings 13:15
verses.text: Then he said unto him, Come home with me, and eat bread.

verses.name: 1 Kings 13:16
verses.text: And he said, I may not return with thee, nor go in with thee: neither will I eat bread nor drink water with thee in this place:
